
                            
                            <p>以前零钱通转个3万就达标了，这个月开始要10万了，挪10万出来转进去零钱通转回去还得几天才给30，不太划算了啊 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/08/084549aifqcrqqkklxohlq.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/08/084549aifqcrqqkklxohlq.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p>
